alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson; Johnson; Nemaha; Otoe; Pawnee; Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 3:02PM CST until January 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations less than one inch and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Iowa and southeast Nebraska. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Gage; Jefferson; Johnson; Nemaha; Otoe; Pawnee; Richardson
